titles.title: For the relief of Roger Paul Robert Kozik.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 7/21/2004--Introduced. States that notwithstanding his inability to satisfy the requirements of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to knowledge and understanding of the English language, Roger Paul Robert Kozik shall be deemed eligible for naturalization upon the filing of the appropriate application if otherwise qualified under such Act.
